While there is no general agreement upon the greatest [[film]], many publications and organizations have tried to determine the '''films considered the best'''. The films mentioned in this article have all been mentioned in a notable [[Statistical survey|survey]] â be it a popular [[Opinion poll|poll]] or [[Film criticism|critics']] poll. Many of these sources focus on [[Cinema of the United States|American films]] or were polls of [[English language|English-speaking]] film goers, but those considered the greatest within their respective countries are also included here.
None of these citations should be viewed as scientific measures of the film-watching world. They are often influenced by [[vote stacking]] or they survey a population with skewed [[demographics]]. [[Internet]]-based surveys have a self-selecting audience of unknown participants. The methodology of some surveys may be questionable. Sometimes (as in the case of the [[American Film Institute]]) voters were asked to select films from a limited list of entries.
